author: Mustafa Hashmi
title: Only compass that works on Moto360

author: Pete Graybash
comment: Sit the 360 on the table and rotate it... north drifts 30 degrees . But do the same with the Nexus 5 and it works fine. Can't fault this app for that.

author: Troy Saltiel
comment: The number in degrees doesn't show on the Moto 360 and unfortunately it is cut off on the bottom but that's not your fault. Works great on the phone.

reply.author: Eoin
reply.content: I've just updated the app to fix this; the heading and direction should now show up. Thanks for letting me know!

title: Number doesn't show on Moto 360

author: Michael N
comment: Color customization doesn't carry over to watch

reply.author: Eoin
reply.content: Thanks for the heads-up Michael; we've just found the cause of the bug, so we've updated the app to try to patch it up. Sorry for any inconvenience we may have caused!

author: David Armitage
comment: Very nice thanks. Now fully functional and working well. Now has stars it deserves. :-)

reply.author: Eoin
reply.content: Okay, I think we've fixed the bug - we just put out an update. Thanks so much for your feedback, and sorry for any inconvenience caused!

title: Works well on Gear Live

author: Eugene O'Brien
comment: I have downloaded a LOT of compass apps but this by far the clearest and the best. It is beautifully designed with a number of options and it can be customised fully. You can find true north with the GPS which is really very handy!! A brilliant app!!!
title: Loved it!!!!

author: Billy-Ray Healey
comment: Compass is brilliant!  No drain on battery life, and it works perfectly offline too. Without a doubt the best compass out there, much better then any of the paid ones. And the best part is NO ANNOYING ADS!  Finally, a good app with no ads! I would recommend this to absolutely anyone!
title: Really cool compass!
